Package org.trellisldp.http

Class LdpResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trellisldp.http.LdpResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestFilter

    @PreMatching
@Provider
@Priority(2020)
@Singleton
@Path("{partition}{path: .*}")
public class LdpResource
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestFilter

        binaryService - the datastream service
        partitions - a map of partitions for use with custom hostnames
